Name: Queers Caf√©
Review Text: Friendly bar - with an older local crowd. They have different theme nights - check out their website (and definitely go to gay bingo) go early to get a good seat.

Name: Queers Caf√©
Review Text: Nice bartenders. Friendly people. While the bar is a little bit old fashion.

Name: Queers Caf√©
Review Text: My sister and I walked in here after a tour one day. The owner happened to be working and talked to us for hours. All the staff and patrons were welcoming and friendly. This bar is definitely a great place to meet locals and relax with a great drink or two.

Name: Queers Caf√©
Review Text: America has Ru Paul, Amsterdam has Queers! Great shows and fun on Friday. More events on other days, great staff and busy or not: it's always fun.! Sponsor of "Mother's On Tour",  a Drag Show that visits nursing and elderly homes in Amsterdam.  Just wonderful guys ‚ô•

Name: Queers Caf√©

Name: Queers Caf√©

Name: Queers Caf√©
Review Text: Incredible bar. We came in on bingo night and they were speaking Dutch but switched to English for us very funny very kind staff and great atmosphere.

Name: Queers Caf√©
Review Text: Very nice queer bar where everyone is welcome. Bartender was so nice and the drag was just amazing! Recommend for lonely traveller or couple üëåüèº

Name: Queers Caf√©
Review Text: One of the nicest gay bars in town with fab staff and lots of entertainment. I always feel welcome here and so do many others of different ages, races and looks.

Name: Queers Caf√©
Review Text: One of Amsterdam's finest gay bars! Great staff, cosy atmosphere and on Friday they've got a great Drag night.

Name: Queers Caf√©
Review Text: Queer bar by the canel, monday bingo with drag queens!

Name: Queers Caf√©
Review Text: It's a friendly small pub with a cheesy, fabulously camp, music policy. If you like to hear the latest RnB hit this is not the place to go.

Review Text: Felt more like a bar rather than cafeteria, but the staff were kind and polite to their costumers.

Name: Queers Caf√©
Review Text: Small and cozy - that I can agree with, and a very attentive bartender works here. Note that there's a fee for paying with credit cards.

Name: Queers Caf√©
